active_learning.discussion_prompt: Compare and contrast IPsec and TLS/SSL in terms of layer of operation (network vs. transport), use cases (e.g., site-to-site VPN vs. remote web access), and security features (e.g., IP-wide protection vs. application-specific). Which would you choose for securing a remote access VPN and why? Support your choice with references to NIST SP 800-77 or RFCs.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
